RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 69. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WILD WINE stalked the pace pressing abreast rival in upper stretch edging clear late. HIKE'S DREAM sent clear set the pace holding daylight through the turn being hooked inside in upper stretch ceding grudgingly in the final yards. MCGOLDEN tracked the pace edging closer to loom in upper stretch hanging late. SCREAMING JEREMY raced evenly into upper stretch lacking a closing punch there. FOGGY ALBION slow early gave a mild rally from mid track down the lane. KLIMT RIDE faded on the turn. LAKE HAMILTON was never involved. S S CAESAR offered little.

ENTRY.NAME: S S Caesar
ENTRY.COMMENT: offered little

ENTRY.NAME: Hike's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked inside, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Hamilton
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: McGolden
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, vied upper stretch, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Foggy Albion
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally mid track lane

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Wine
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed top lane, edged clear abreast

ENTRY.NAME: Screaming Jeremy
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 4 wide lane, lacked punch

ENTRY.NAME: Klimt Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 7 1/2F Turf CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 5 Allowed 3 lbs. Cl aiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run ONE MILE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYSTIFIED tracked the pace from the outside rallying to lead on the far turn digging in from the four path down the lane finding more late. TAMANRASSETT stalked the pace pressing into the far turn extending inside down the stretch vying willingly to the end. FOREVER POE slow early lagged while losing ground to upper stretch rallying in the six path late to move up. SULEMAN went evenly through the far turn vying four wide down the lane needing late surge. BLOOD MOON away alertly set the pace ceding on the far turn fading along the rail down the lane. TRIGZ TOO stalked the pace to the far turn weakening along the inside into upper stretch. ENJOY BASEBALL raced mid pack tiring to upper stretch. NOT SO EASY played no factor. GATES OF HEAVEN was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Gates of Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Forever Poe
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged losing ground into lane, gained late 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Enjoy Baseball
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, tired to lane

ENTRY.NAME: Not So Easy
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Blood Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, ceded inside lane, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Trigz Too
ENTRY.OWNER: Siesta Thoroughbred Racing Rossi Gregg and Toporcer Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, weakened inside

ENTRY.NAME: Suleman
ENTRY.COMMENT: went evenly, 4 wide lane, needed surge

ENTRY.NAME: Mystified
ENTRY.OWNER: Walker Devin D and Parrish Wallace
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside, surged to lead far turn, 4 wide lane, dug in

ENTRY.NAME: Tamanrassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed into far turn, willingly lane, saved place

G MONEY LIV sent clear set the pace through the turn digging from the four path down the lane ceding late to inside pressure. FUELED UP hustled along chased to upper stretch finishing evenly near mid track. PAYNT THE KITTY a step slow through the turn lost ground to upper stretch finishing evenly six wide. NURSE KATIE saved ground tiring in upper stretch. SEA MONSTER stalked the pace looming to upper stretch fading late. MOONLIGHT MISS was never involved. CHALDEA trailed throughout.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: KICKSTARTER sent hard pressed the pace dueling abreast rival through the turn into upper stretch wearing foe down drawing out late. TOLLER close early dropped off on the turn rebidding from the three path down the lane saving place. HIDDEN RULER slow early saved ground to upper stretch finishing well along the rail. AWESOME MINER hustled to the front pressed from the inside dueling through the turn into upper stretch wearing down late in the two path. GET HAMMERED was always outrun. RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 77. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 5 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VINTAGE SPARKLE unhurried early surged quickly along the inside on the far turn wresting the lead in upper stretch edging clear late. PETTIGO GIRL stalked the pace pressing three deep at the quarter pole into upper stretch ceding to inside pressure while securing place. TWEAQUED pressed on lead dueled between horses in upper stretch weakening late. YO YO MON pressured the early pace tiring on the far turn. HERO'S DAUGHTER raced evenly through the backside then faded on the far turn.

(Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allo wances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDY INVASION unhurried early fired on the far turn dueling in upper stretch edging clear late. LATE IN THE GAME slow early gave a quick move on the far turn vying willingly from mid track down the lane. RAYMOND prompted the pace leading to the quarter pole dueling in upper stretch wearing down late. EMJAY stalked the early pace giving way on the far turn. INDIAN EMPIRE pressed the early pace then wilted on the far turn. AGADOR SPARTACUS tracked the pace chasing on the far turn fading in upper stretch. JOYFUL CANDY took a bad step losing the rider on the backside walking off after the race.

LADY MADISON stalked the pace drawing even abreast rival on the far turn dueling in upper stretch being out gamed late. MALIBU MARLEE slow early gained some on the backside chasing to upper stretch closing the gap late. IRON WILMA was never involved. FASHION FRAME pressed the early pace giving way on the far turn.
